attributes.action: Give Full Disclosure of All Information Relating to UFO Sightings and Phenomenon
attributes.additional_details:
Nick Pope - UFO investigator for UK government.
MUFON - 1000s of reported UFO sightings and cases.
The recent leaked Clinton emails prove that high ranking US government officials know of the UFO existence and still they cover up the truth.
attributes.background: There have been recorded sightings of UFOs over the UK since the 1940's. The British military and Government knows of this but have refused to acknowledge the existence of these. More than 60% of the worlds population accepts that extra terrestrial life exists, it is time we were given the truth.

rejection.details:
The National Archives has already published files relating to UFO sightings:

http://www.nationalarchives.gov.uk/ufos/
